activities.name: Chalk Obstacle
activities.info: Draw some paths on the floor in chalk like an obstacle where on some they hop, and they follow a path or whatever. And run it with them.

activities.name: Shared Book Reading - Pictures
activities.info: Have a picture book, and share reading. Name pictures → ask "Where's ___?" → pause for child to say/point

activities.name: Point to....
activities.info: "Point to nose/cat/cup" → add body parts → add 2-step "point then clap"

activities.name: Name & fetch
activities.info: "Bring me the ball" → 2 objects → 2-step ("bring ball, then put in box")

activities.name: Gesture parade
activities.info:
Model → wait → shape hands to sign → pair with words
(wave, clap, "more/all done")

activities.name: Songs with actions
activities.info:
If youre happy and you know it
Incy Wincy Spinder
Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
Wind the bobbin up
Ring and round the rosie

activities.name: Hide & find (under cup)
activities.info: Hide under one → shuffle slowly → faster

activities.name: Posting box / shape sorter
activities.info: One slot → multiple shapes → name shapes as posting

activities.name: Stack & knock
activities.info: Build 2–3 high → copy your tower → sort by size/shape

activities.name: Matching colours
activities.info: Get a bunch of pens and blocks. Match the colours.

activities.name: Roll the ball....to
activities.info: Roll the ball to random people within the room

activities.name: Container play (fill/dump)
activities.info:
Cups, box, balls
Scoop → pour to another → pour to target line

activities.name: Treasure basket
activities.info: Put random stuff in a basket

activities.name: Play dough
activities.info: Make Play-Doh and have fun with it

entries.content:
who looks after kari when going to pablo
talked about fiacra parents, rita said need to work on relationship, may have said it a few times
fiacra annoyed with rita later, said rita is beign wierd about things, and then annoyed about cleaning floor
rita annoyed that fiacra annoyed
arguement esculate
fiacra told rita she was being spiteful, and remembering things in the past when he asked fro an example. deflection.
rita yelled, and did burst out scream.
entries.resolution: Fiacra is more mindful of influence.... but this doesnt feel enough
entries.lessons: this is too much.... doesnt feel enough but something needs to be managed
